name: Shield of the Dawnflower, Greater
text: You create a disk of sunlight on one arm. Any creature that strikes you with a melee attack deals normal damage, but also takes 1d6 points of damage + 1 point per caster level. Half of this damage is fire damage and half is holy damage (as the spell flame strike). An undead creature or a creature particularly vulnerable to light that hits you instead takes 2d6 points of damage +1 point per caster level. Creatures with reach weapons are not subject to this damage if they attack you. The shield provides illumination equivalent to a daylight spell. You can have only one instance of this spell in effect at a time. It does not stack with similar damaging aura spells such as fire shield or shield of the Dawnflower (The Inner Sea World Guide 296).
text_zh: 你在你的手臂上创造了一面由阳光组成的圆盘。任何使用近战攻击命中你的生物，在造成普通攻击的同时，都会受到1d6加每施法者等级1点伤害。这伤害一半是火焰伤害，另一半则是源于神力（如同焰击术法术）。一名命中你的不死生物或对强光尤为易伤的生物则会受到2d6加每施法者等级1点伤害。使用长武器或远程命中你的生物在攻击你时不会受到该伤害。盾牌可以提供如同一道昼明术（daylight）法术的照明。你同一时间只能维持一个该法术的效果。该法术不会与类似的伤害性灵光类法术效果叠加，比如火盾术（fire shield）或日蚀之盾（shield of the Dawnflower）（内海世界指南第296页）。
